job_description:
• Education in industry related associate degree.
• Working towards a STEM related degree.
• Equivalent military training and experience.
• Or equivalent work experience Experience with semiconductor manufacturing processes.
• Familiarity with statistical process control (SPC) and other quality control methodologies Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Engineering, Materials Science, or related field Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Excellent communication and teamwork abilities Ability to work 12-hour shifts (3 on/4 off and 4 on/3 off) including night shift Certification in equipment maintenance or relevant technical areas Less than 2 years.
